data.name: The Thing
data.description: The Thing is a rocky Brawler who deals massive damage to single targets.

starItems.name: The Thing
starItems.description: The Thing is a rocky Brawler who deals massive damage to single targets.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, flip <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on the primary target.

Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, flip <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on the primary target.

Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>190%</color> damage.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, flip <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on the primary target.

Bonus Attack for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> times

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, flip <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on the primary target.

Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> times for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks

Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, flip <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on the primary target.

6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary attacks
Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>4</color> times

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>340%</color> damage.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, flip <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>, <color=#fff568>Minor Deflect</color>, and <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> on the primary target.

Bonus Attack <color=#86e619>4</color> times for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > On <color=#fff568>WAR DEFENSE</color>, this attack targets the enemy with the highest Focus, instead, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
 > Clear all positive effects on the target.
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Trauma</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>2,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.
 > This attack cannot be counterattacked or blocked.

1.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>7%</color> + <color=#86e619>7%</color> per <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally.

When an enemy attacks this character, a <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> ally, or a <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally, if this character does not have <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > If target is a <color=#fff568>BIO PROTECTOR</color>, clear <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. This clear cannot be resisted.
 > This attack gains +<color=#86e619>75%</color> extra Damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing when an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> or <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally
Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor for self, <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color>, <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color>, Namor, and She-Hulk allies

2.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>7%</color> + <color=#86e619>7%</color> per <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally.

When an enemy attacks this character, a <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> ally, or a <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally, if this character does not have <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>75%</color> Piercing.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > If target is a <color=#fff568>BIO PROTECTOR</color>, clear <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. This clear cannot be resisted.
 > This attack gains +<color=#86e619>75%</color> extra Damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color>, <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color>, Namor, and She-Hulk allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Piercing when an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> or <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally

3.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>7%</color> + <color=#86e619>7%</color> per <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally.

When an enemy attacks this character, a <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> ally, or a <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally, if this character does not have <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > If target is a <color=#fff568>BIO PROTECTOR</color>, clear <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. This clear cannot be resisted.
 > This attack gains +<color=#86e619>75%</color> extra Damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color>, <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color>, Namor, and She-Hulk allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor
<color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color>, <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color>, Namor, and She-Hulk allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Armor

4.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>7%</color> + <color=#86e619>7%</color> per <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally.

When an enemy attacks this character, a <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> ally, or a <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally, if this character does not have <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > If target is a <color=#fff568>BIO PROTECTOR</color>, clear <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. This clear cannot be resisted.
 > This attack gains +<color=#86e619>75%</color> extra Damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color>, <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color>, Namor, and She-Hulk allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing when an enemy attacks a <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> or <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally

5.description:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, On Spawn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>7%</color> + <color=#86e619>7%</color> per <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally.

When an enemy attacks this character, a <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color> ally, or a <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color> ally, if this character does not have <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color>, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>:
 > If target is a <color=#fff568>BIO PROTECTOR</color>, clear <color=#86e619>5</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>. This clear cannot be resisted.
 > This attack gains +<color=#86e619>75%</color> extra Damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor. <color=#fff568>FANTASTIC FOUR</color>, <color=#fff568>NEW AVENGER</color>, Namor, and She-Hulk allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Armor.
